text: "War of Nerves" is a song by the band All Saints. It was released by London Records on 23 November 1998. It was the fifth and last single from their first album, which was also called All Saints. Shaznay Lewis, Natalie Appleton and Nicole Appleton wrote the song, and producers Cameron McVey and Magnus Fiennes helped them. War of Nerves is a ballad about dying. It was based on the death of Diana, Princess of Wales. "War of Nerves" was at number seven on the UK Singles Chart. This made it the bandâ€™s fifth single in a row that reached the top 10. == References == Category:R&B; songs Category:1998 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:All Saints (group) songs
title: War of Nerves
